title: Invitation Marriage
body_full: Halo semua, dengan rasa syukur saya ingin mengundang teman2 untuk hadir di pernikahan saya

title: Ready to face our new product?
body_full: Besok kami akan launching produk jam tangan mewah anti karat anti air anti body

title: Tambang Bytes: Grow your game with help from Google Play
body_short:
Hello,
At Google Play we’re committed to helping you grow..
body_full:
Hello,
At Google Play we’re committed to helping you grow.
If you are a small game developer studio - from 1 person and up to 50 employees - you can now apply for the Indie Games Accelerator.
